All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddElementWindow
Window for adding new rows to the table User can enter data for a new dog entry
AddReportWindow
Window for generating reports in PDF and HTML formats
DeleteElementWindow
Window for deleting rows from the table User can select a row to remove from the data
Dog
A class representing a dog It contains information about the nickname, breed, and awards.
DogList
Main function
EditElementWindow
Window for editing existing rows in the table User can select a row and change its data
FileManager
Manages file operations with multithreading support.
FileManager.FileOperationCallback<T>
Callback interface for asynchronous file operations.
InputException
Universal exception for handling input errors in the application with validation methods
InputException.ErrorType
Types of errors
InputOutputWindow
Base class for all input and output windows in the application Provides common functionality for dialogs that get user input and show messages to the user
interfaceList<T>
Package for working with a list of items
List<T>
Class for working with a list of items
MainWindow
Main window class for the Dog Festival application
ReportGenerator
Report generation tool with multithreading support Generates reports in PDF and HTML formats from XML data
